          STEM OPT Workshop (International Students Only)
         
 STEM OPT Workshop (International Students Only) 
 In this workshop, an International Student Advisor will go over the process to apply for Optional Practical Training (OPT) for STEM students. OPT is a form of work authorization for F-1 international students that will be graduating soon or have recently graduated. We will discuss the eligibility requirements, application procedures, and FAQs that encompasses the OPT process.  
 Register for June 11 workshop:   
 https://ucr.zoom.us/meeting/register/tJ0qcOuhqzwrGd3hbRBR4WA1J8nWh9s5mSNl 
 
 
 
  Friday, June 11 at 11:30am
           

          
            to  1:30pm
